ðŸ“– Summary: LVGL is a free and open-source graphics library written in C, designed for creating embedded graphical user interfaces (GUIs) on microcontrollers (MCUs) and microprocessors (MPUs). It offers a wide range of widgets, styling options, and layout features, making it suitable for various display types and platforms with minimal resource requirements.
